thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com
thread.title: Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text: I'm new to crypto currency. I've never had a paper wallet, so I figured this would be very difficult to use. I was pleasantly surprised to find out how easy it was to move the coins around. I also found the big screen easy to read and there weren't any little buttons to push. Just figured out how to store Dashcoin on it, sweet. I can't think of any disadvantages. Oh, and the box it came in was first class.
